title: Neon Commerce
description: A cinematic e-commerce experience with 3D product reveals and neon theming.

caseStudy.problem: Create an immersive shopping flow with minimal friction and standout visuals.
caseStudy.solution: Engineered a fast, responsive UI with 3D interactions and GPU-friendly glow effects.

title: Aurora Portfolio
description: A personal site template focused on parallax, glassmorphism, and smooth typography.

caseStudy.problem: Deliver polish and performance across devices without heavy dependencies.
caseStudy.solution: Leveraged GPU-accelerated transforms, lazy loading, and granular animation control.

title: Harmonia AI
description: A playful AI playground for sound-reactive visuals and generative loops.

caseStudy.problem: Fuse audio analysis with responsive visual art in the browser.
caseStudy.solution: Implemented performant shaders and decoupled UI from render loop.
